headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid GLW and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Corning’s 23.7% return over the past six months has outpaced the S&P 500 by 16%, and its stock price has climbed to $50.30 per share. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the run-up might have investors contemplating their next move.
